description: Safety never takes a backseat in the Virtus. Up to 6 airbags protect the car's occupants in the event of a critical incidence.
Open highways or tight city corners, the Virtus keeps a firm grip on the road with Electronic Stability Control
In the event of a collision, multi-collision brakes set into action to stop the vehicle and reduce additional damage
Striking to look at, these signature LED tail lamps shine bright for those behind you.
Chiselled to perfection, its sharp shoulder lines exude sophistication and elegance effortlessly.
Sharp, striking and classy - the chrome grille give the Virtus a bold and distinctive look, while the window strip and door handles elevate its already impressive design.
Sit back, stretch out, and relax in the Virtus’ spacious interiors. Interiors so comfortable, it will make you feel like home.
Lean back and relax; the Virtus has you covered.
The Virtus' infotainment system keeps you connected and entertained on-the-go.
No phone charger? No problem. The Virtus comes standard with wireless mobile charging.
Your very own personal assistant, My Volkswagen Connect, puts the Virtus at your fingertips.
Whatever the weather, inside the Virtus, you decide the temperature.
he 1.5L TSI EVO is engineered to provide power on demand with maximum efficiency.
Get maximum power while keeping fuel consumption in check with Active Cylinder Technology on the 1.5L TSI EVO engine.
Seamless gear changes = a smoother driving experience with the 7-speed DSG in the Virtus.
Drive according to your mood by switching to Eco, City and Sport modes.
